name: VideoWorkLink
tag_list: online-employment, talent, freelance, video, video-work, video-worker
overview:
VideoWorkLink (VWL) is a platform that allows you to work online face-to-face in real time.

VWL allows you to hire video-workers that work online face-to-face in real time, find video-work on continuing basis from home/another city/another country, guide your freelancers online as if you were in the same office and pay for hours of video-work absolutely commission-free.
